short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compress images to save disk space

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How it works?
1-Click extension icon to open online tool.
2-Drag and drop or select images from your computer.
3-Click compress button to get back small size images that will save disk space.
